title: 2-Pack of Ass Pt. I with Brandon “Jinx” Jenkins
description: Welcome to a true full-circle moment, friends. Brandon “Jinx” Jenkins—co-host of Revolt TV’s State of the Culture and host of the Mogul podcast on Spotify—makes his illustrious Throwing Fits debut nearly two and a half years since first getting his jeans clowned as the inaugural guest on a podcast that shall not be named for a certain sports media company. Jinx links up with the boys to discuss his favorite conspiracy theories, finding the grown ass man streetwear sweet spot, earning a millions dollars in a lifetime, the definitive sneaker Mount Rushmore, the death of blogs, getting your fit clowned by coworkers and much more on part 1 of a marathon sesh of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
